text: Paul Kerlin (born 18 October 1953) is a Scottish former professional footballer. He played in the Netherlands for De Graafschap and Go Ahead Eagles. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:De Graafschap players Category:Go Ahead Eagles players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Scottish expatriate footballers Category:Scottish expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands
title: Paul Kerlin
